description: STRING No. 58 // From 2020-05-01 // By Jonas Kasper Jensen www.jonaskasperjensen.com // Size 110 cm x 140 cm // The RED lake series of paintings were painted in a rush the day before the lockdown in Denmark caused by Covid-19. The series has a feverish quality to it as if a dilution had temporarily occupied the mind and body of Jensen.
name: RED lake III/III
